text: UMvelinqangi akukho okunokukhonzwa ngaphandle kwakhe ungophilayo, ungumondli nomvikeli wazo zonke izidalwa akazeli yena futhi akalali kungokwakhe noma ngabe yini esemazulwini futhi noma ngabe yini esemhlabeni, ubani yena lowo ongancengela (omunye) kuYena ngaphandle kwemvume yakhe na? Wazi (okwakukhona) ngaphambilini kwabo nokuyokuba ngasemuva kwabo, futhi akukho lutho oluhaqe ulwazi lwakhe ngaphandle kwalokho akuthandayo, isihlalo sakhe singaphezulu kwamazulu nemihlaba, futhi ukuqaphele kokubili akumsindi, futhi uphakeme mukhulu kakhulu
